column4: I have a company FTP, and I was wondering if I could make one of my local folders automatically upload anything in a specific folder to the FTP? would be nice to have it so whenever a file has a change it auto-uploads to the FTP.
theres the fuse-ftp tools that can allow you to mount a 'remote ftp site' as if it was a local directory.
thats one way of doing it. sort of.
